alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 9:33PM EDT until May 13 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... White River at Elliston. Wabash River at Riverton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... White River at Edwardsport. Wabash River at Lafayette down to Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. .Recent rainfall will lead to minor flooding along the Wabash and Lower White Rivers in Indiana. Additional rainfall is expected over the next several days, bringing additional flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, MAY 13... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Edwardsport. * WHEN...Until Friday, May 13. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Flooding closes Old Vincennes Road. High water crosses SR 358 on the Daviess County side just west of the levee. Flooding begins to affect higher bottomlands. Residential property of river cabins begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EDT Thursday /6:00 PM CDT Thursday/ the stage was 15.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM EDT Thursday /6:00 PM CDT Thursday/ was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 16.0 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall to 15.9 feet and begin rising again Saturday evening. It will rise to 17.0 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, May 13. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
